name: Essence Regulation
description:
Ludum Dare 52

Theme: Harvest

LD: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/essence-regulation

Source: https://github.com/Augmotic/LD52

You have received reports of an outbreak of Essence in a nearby warehouse. Harvest all of the Source nodes and make it back to extraction. Beware of the Source Vestigal's that linger.

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Look
  • LMB - Shoot / Cast
  • RMB - ADS
  • F - Flashlight
  • R - Reload
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Space - Jump
  • Ctrl - Crouch
  • 1 - Pistol
  • 2 - Detection: Shows Vestigals through walls.
  • 3 - Diffuse: Disables Vestigals
  • 4 - Conceal: Alllows passing through Vestigals
